name: The Battle of Kursk
description:
Operation Citadel has begun !

In the summer 1943, Germany has launched Operation Citadel, intending to cut off the Soviets at Kursk !

A lone T34

Equipped with your trusty T34 (1942 model), you must face off against the German armoured divisions in two gamemodes : Attack & Infinite.

In Attack, you must storm the enemy defensive positions and capture their flag !

In Infinite, you square off against an infinite onslaught of Panzers for a highscore !

Commands

> ZQSD : Move your tank
> Left-Mouse : Fire
> C (in Tank Mode) : Switch to Free-Mode Camera
> T (in Free-Camera Mode) : Switch to Tank Mode
